	- assert(bool)(balanceOf[_from] + balanceOf[_to] == previousBalances)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/6/0x142f09843aae651c3ba61421595610cb6c8aff66.sol:

W4T._transfer (/unique_chucks/6/0x142f09843aae651c3ba61421595610cb6c8aff66.sol#61-73) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- assert(bool)(balanceOf[_from] + balanceOf[_to] == previousBalances) (/unique_chucks/6/0x142f09843aae651c3ba61421595610cb6c8aff66.sol#70-73)
	- require(bool)(balanceOf[_from] >= _value) (/unique_chucks/6/0x142f09843aae651c3ba61421595610cb6c8aff66.sol#64-65)
	- require(bool)(balanceOf[_to] + _value > balanceOf[_to]) (/unique_chucks/6/0x142f09843aae651c3ba61421595610cb6c8aff66.sol#65)

W4T.burn (/unique_chucks/6/0x142f09843aae651c3ba61421595610cb6c8aff66.sol#101-110) uses timestamp for comparisons
